title: About Us | Chiropractor in Port Angeles, WA | Boulevard Natural Wellness Center
description: About Us in Port Angeles, WA. Boulevard Natural Wellness Center is your local Chiropractor in Port Angeles serving all of your needs. Call us today at (360) 452-7827 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Unlike conventional medicine, which focuses on attempting to treat disease once it occurs, Boulevard Natural Wellness Center emphasizes improving your health in an effort to reduce the risk of pain and illness in the first place. Most people would rather be healthy and avoid illness, if they could. This is one of the main reasons for the big surge in the popularity of our wellness center. For some, Boulevard Natural Wellness Center will take them back to a place that is cozy and familiar, offering a rediscovery of health and wellness that had been previously known but long lost. For others, the journey may offer a new center, one never before experienced. People are recognizing the benefit of seeking an alternative to traditional medicine; one that will help them achieve and maintain optimal health. Please take the time to meet the doctor, team, and our wellness network dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives. To fully understand the nature of your health we recommend you join our free website membership program. As a patient at Boulevard Natural Wellness Center we will personally tailor a wellness program specifically targeted to your wellness needs using the least invasive yet highly-effective techniques and services. Stamper Chiropractic & Massage Thank you for considering our integrated wellness center for your health needs. We strive to provide natural non-toxic healthcare to our patients. We are focused on providing a well-rounded treatment plan that involves adjustments, nutrition and massage. With the decline in the quality of our country's food supply, there are many causes of disease that we are able to treat with [energy testing](#) and supplementation. Dr. Stamper is a family chiropractor specializing in children and pregnant woman. He is Webster certified and works in conjunction with the local midwives to provide care for the mommas and the new babies! He treats patients of all ages from birth to geriatrics. He is additionally trained by the ICPA (International Chiropractic Pediatric Association) Insurance accepted Dr. Stamper is a provider for First Choice Health, Medicare, and Regence. Auto Injuries Chiropractic care and massage are the treatment of choice for auto accidents. Since most injuries sustained are sprains and strains of soft tissue along with whiplash and subluxation; chiropractic and massage are a natural, safe and effective treatment for these injuries. Work Injuries Whether you are a state insured worker or a private party insured, Dr. Stamper is a provider dedicated to get you back to work. An accident report should be filed with your employer and we can help you file your claim with the State.
